text: nāṉ. Ēḻu koḻutta pacakkaḷai, ēḻu melinta pacakkaḷ tiṉpataiyum; ēḻu pacamaiyāṉa katirkaḷaiyum, vēṟu (ēḻu) kāyntu (cāviyāki viṭṭa) katirkaḷaiyum tiṭamāka nāṉ kaṉavil kaṇṭēṉ; piratāṉikaḷē! Nīṅkaḷ kaṉavu viḷakkam kūṟak kūṭiyavarkaḷāka iruntāl, eṉṉuṭaiya (ik)kaṉaviṉ palaṉai eṉakku aṟiviyuṅkaḷ" eṉṟu (tam piratāṉikaḷaiyaḻaittu ekiptu nāṭṭu) aracar kūṟiṉār
